mean_cn: n. 偶然性，【安全】意外事故，可能性，【审计】意外开支
mean_en: something (such as an emergency) that might happen
word_etyma: con共同+ting接触+ency表名词→两件事接触→两车相撞→意外事故
short_phrase: The helicopter team is ready for any contingency.
sentence: With helicopter support, our team is ready for any contingency.
sentence_trans: 有了直升机帮助，我们团队作好准备前往任何意外事故。
